name: Laser Defender (RamCid)
description:
This is a project made for GameDevs.tv's course: Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D

Sprites were downloaded from https://www.kenney.nl/assets

SFX: https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Space bar to shoot.
